text: This project is a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) assistant. It allows users to ask questions, retrieves relevant information from stored documents using vector similarity, and generates accurate answers using a language model.
The system consists of document ingestion, text embedding using a sentence transformer model, vector storage, similarity search, and a FastAPI backend that exposes a chat API.
Users interact with the system through an API endpoint called /api/chat. The backend retrieves relevant document chunks and generates responses based on them.
